item.description:
Saturday, August 9th, 7-9 pm
Improv Survivor, Featuring Lost Marbles
Spiegel Auditorium, Cambridge Center for Adult Education
$10
56 Brattle Street, Cambridge, MA (near Harvard Square)
Show begins 7:00 pm, Lost Marbles will feature the show, and host the improv survivor elimination challenge.

Opening act: Bari Lee, Standup Comedienne Extraordinaire!

Followed By: Lost Marbles (AKA most of your Organizers.)

Followed By: "Improv Survivor" elimination challenge, which is your chance to demonstrate your improv abilities and win cold, hard cash. Call (781) 224-3363 to make reservations or to become a contestant. (Organized by Bob Gautreau.)


See you soon!
item.name: Improv Show!!
